events.name: load
events.description: Emitted when image has been loaded by the browser
events.description_zh: 浏览器加载图像时发出

events.name: error
events.description: Emitted when browser could not load the image
events.description_zh: 当浏览器无法加载图像时发出

ratio.description: Force the component to maintain an aspect ratio

srcset.description_zh: 与 srcset 属性的语法相同

sizes.description_zh: 与 sizes 属性相同的语法

placeholder-src.description: While waiting for your image to load, you can use a placeholder image
placeholder-src.description_zh: 在等待图像加载时，您可以使用占位符图像

error-src.description: In case your image fails to load, you can use an error image
error-src.description_zh: 如果您的图像无法加载，您可以使用错误图像

initial-ratio.description: Use it when not specifying 'ratio' but still wanting an initial aspect ratio
initial-ratio.description_zh: 如果未指定 'ratio' 但仍需要初始纵横比，请使用它

width.description: Forces image width; Must also include the unit (px or %)
width.description_zh: 强制图像宽度;还必须包含单位（px 或 %）

height.description: Forces image height; Must also include the unit (px or %)
height.description_zh: 强制图像高度;还必须包含单位（px 或 %）

loading.description: Lazy or immediate load; Same syntax as loading attribute
loading.description_zh: 延迟加载或立即加载;与 loading attribute 相同的语法

loading-show-delay.description: Delay showing the spinner when image changes; Gives time for the browser to load the image from cache to prevent flashing the spinner unnecessarily; Value should represent milliseconds
loading-show-delay.description_zh: 图像更改时延迟显示微调器;为浏览器提供从缓存加载图像的时间，以防止不必要地闪烁微调器;值应表示毫秒

crossorigin.description_zh: 与 crossorigin 属性的语法相同

decoding.description_zh: 与 decoding 属性语法相同

referrerpolicy.description_zh: 与 referrerpolicy 属性的语法相同

fetchpriority.description: Provides a hint of the relative priority to use when fetching the image
fetchpriority.description_zh: 提供获取图像时要使用的相对优先级的提示

fit.description: How the image will fit into the container; Equivalent of the object-fit prop; Can be coordinated with 'position' prop
fit.description_zh: 图像如何适应容器;相当于 object-fit prop;可以与 'position' prop 协调

position.description: The alignment of the image into the container; Equivalent of the object-position CSS prop
position.description_zh: 图像与容器中的对齐方式;相当于 object-position CSS 属性

alt.description: Specifies an alternate text for the image, if the image cannot be displayed
alt.description_zh: 如果无法显示图像，则指定图像的替代文本

img-class.description: CSS classes to be attributed to the native img element
img-class.description_zh: 要归因于本机 img 元素的 CSS 类

img-style.description: Apply CSS to the native img element
img-style.description_zh: 将 CSS 应用于本机 img 元素

spinner-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
spinner-color.desc: Color name for default Spinner (unless using a 'loading' slot)
spinner-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

spinner-size.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name, for default Spinner (unless using a 'loading' slot)

no-spinner.description: Do not display the default spinner while waiting for the image to be loaded; It is overriden by the 'loading' slot when one is present
no-spinner.description_zh: 在等待图像加载时不显示默认微调器;如果存在 'loading' 插槽，它将被 'loading' 插槽覆盖

no-native-menu.description: Disables the native context menu for the image
no-native-menu.description_zh: 禁用图像的本机上下文菜单

no-transition.description: Disable default transition when switching between old and new image
no-transition.description_zh: 在新旧图像之间切换时禁用默认过渡

slots.name: default
slots.description: Default slot can be used for captions. See examples
slots.description_zh: 默认插槽可用于字幕。查看示例

slots.name: loading
slots.description: While image is loading, this slot is being displayed on top of the component; Suggestions: a spinner or text
slots.description_zh: 在加载图像时，此插槽显示在组件顶部;建议：微调器或文本

slots.name: error
slots.description: Optional slot to be used when image could not be loaded; make sure you assign a min-height and min-width to the component through CSS
slots.description_zh: 无法加载图像时使用的可选插槽;确保通过 CSS 为组件分配 min-height 和 min-width
